programme.title: Casus Belli
programme.desc: Keane gets sidelined. Carrie's work follows her home(c)

programme.title: Rambo
programme.desc: Sylvester Stallone returns to the iconic character of John Rambo in this action sequel that finds the middle-aged veteran living quietly in Thailand as a mechanic and snake wrangler - until a group of American missionaries are caught up in the bloody Burmese civil war raging nearby and reach out to the reluctant killing machine for rescue. Julie Benz, Paul Schulze and Ken Howard costar in this long-awaited follow-up

programme.title: Fargo
programme.desc: Written and directed by the Coen brothers, this quirky crime thriller follows the desperate plight of a car salesman who is so far in debt that he hires two thugs to kidnap his own wife so that he can reap the cash ransom from her wealthy father. Stars Frances McDormand, William H. Macy and Steve Buscemi

programme.title: Paddington
programme.desc: Classic tale of the comic misadventures of a young Peruvian bear who travels to London in search of a home and finds himself lost and alone in Paddington Station until he meets a family who takes him in. It looks as though his luck has changed until he catches the eye of a sinister museum taxidermist, who has an old score to settle. Features Sally Hawkins, Hugh Bonneville, Nicole Kidman and the voice of Ben Whishaw

programme.title: What Women Want
programme.desc: Electrocuted in a hairdryer mishap, womanizing ad exec Nick Marshall (Mel Gibson) is suddenly able to hear the thoughts of the opposite sex. At first, Nick thinks he's been given a terrific advantage in the bedroom and the boardroom, but soon his psychic gift turns the once-clueless Nick into a better father, employee and man, a transformation that does not go unnoticed by his beautiful boss Darcy (Helen Hunt). Alan Alda, Marisa Tomei, Lauren Holly, Ashley Johnson and Mark Feuerstein costar in this comedy blockbuster

programme.title: Diary of a Mad Black Woman
programme.desc: Tyler Perry wrote and costars in this box office smash about a divorcee (Kimberly Elise) who learns to trust and love again after a nasty break up with her arrogant and emotionally distant attorney husband, thanks to comically sage advice from her sassy grandmother Madea. Shemar Moore and Cicely Tyson costar

programme.title: Anesthesia
programme.desc: Multiple lives intersect and connect in the aftermath of the brutal assault of a philosophy professor in New York City

programme.title: Carol
programme.desc: In 1950s New York, a young woman meets an alluring older woman, trapped in a convenient marriage, and when they take a road trip across the country, they find themselves in the throes of a forbidden love that falls outside of the conventions and laws of the time. Stars Cate Blanchett and Rooney Mara

programme.title: Madonna: Rebel Heart Tour
programme.desc: Concert special featuring the iconic superstar as she performs in packed arenas around the globe. Featuring new hits and beloved classics that showcase Madonna's signature visual theatrics, exquisite costumes and awe-inspiring choreography. With exclusive behind-the-scenes access that reveal the pop icon and her legion of dancers as they pour blood, sweat and tears into creating an astonishing arena show celebrated by fans around the world

programme.title: Southpaw
programme.desc: Jake Gyllenhaal stars as a reigning junior middleweight boxing champion, with an impressive career, a loving wife and daughter and a lavish lifestyle. But when tragedy strikes, he hits rock bottom and finds an unlikely savior in a former fighter who trains the city's toughest amateur boxers. With his future on the line, the former champ must fight to reclaim the trust of those he loves the most. Co-stars Rachel McAdams and Forest Whitaker

programme.desc: Chuck faces scrutiny within his office and from the Attorney General. Axe refortifies Axe Capital, and weighs his options for retaliation. Lara intervenes in an emergency at her children's school. Season premiere(c)

programme.title: Gringo: The Dangerous Life of John McAfee
programme.desc: Documentary about the bizarre and scandalous life of tech millionaire John McAfee - famed inventor of anti-virus software - who goes off the grid to live in Belize, building a compound and harem, becoming a drug lord and developing an armed security force to guard himself against the police until he is a suspect in his neighbor's murder and must make a great escape

programme.title: Bang Bang Baby
programme.desc: In this dreamy sci-fi musical set in the 1960s, an isolated small town teenager believes her hopes of becoming a famous singer will come true when her rock star idol gets stranded in town and romance blooms between them but a leak in a nearby chemical plant threatens to turn her dream into a nightmare

programme.title: You Can Count On Me
programme.desc: This two-time Oscar® nominee stars Laura Linney as a single mom whose ordered life is disrupted by a visit from her irresponsible brother (Mark Ruffalo). They weathered tragedy together as kids but now the siblings seem to have little in common, until they begin influencing each other in subtle, subversive ways. Matthew Broderick costars in this acclaimed comedy-drama

programme.title: Congo

programme.desc: Revenge thriller starring Anthony Hopkins as a man haunted by the memory of his daughter's death, who comes to the aid of a young woman who is being viciously harassed by a rogue cop. Co-stars Julia Stiles and Ray Liotta

programme.title: The Hurt Locker
programme.desc: The Academy Awards® for Best Picture, Best Director and Best Original Screenplay went to this gritty war drama about a psychologically unglued bomb removal expert plying his trade in Iraq while his crew becomes increasingly unnerved by his cowboy recklessness. Jeremy Renner, Anthony Mackie and Brian Geraghty star in this acclaimed, tension-filled journey into the heart of darkness

programme.title: Triple 9
programme.desc: An ex-special forces member leads a crew of corrupt police officers and former soldiers in a daring bank robbery in this classic heist thriller. Stars Chiwetel Ejiofor, Kate Winslet, Woody Harrelson and Casey Affleck(n)

There, she meets the reigning showgirl and a battle begins between the two woman as they go to desperate lengths to find fame in Sin City. Stars Elizabeth Berkley and Kyle MacLachlan(n)

programme.desc: Based on a true story, this American classic stars Tom Cruise as an idealistic young soldier who proudly enlists during the Vietnam war and returns as a quadriplegic. Co-stars Kyra Sedgwick and Willem Dafoe. Eight Oscar nominations, including a win for Best Director by Oliver Stone(n)

programme.title: Flyboys
programme.desc: During World War I, a disparate group of young American adventurers comes to France to fight for the Lafayette Escadrille, a volunteer squadron of pilots battling the forces of fascism in the years before their country entered the war. James Franco, Martin Henderson, Tyler Labine, Jean Reno and Jennifer Decker star in this stirringly patriotic salute to forgotten heroes(n)

programme.title: ONE & DONE/BEN SIMMONS
programme.desc: SHOWTIME Sports chronicles the sprawling journey of number one NBA draft pick Ben Simmons. From a relatively anonymous Australian upbringing to high school and college in America to the top of the rookie class in the world's foremost basketball league, ONE & DONE chronicles a pivotal period in a young man's life, capturing Simmons and his inner circle as they realize a lifelong dream in the limelight of an exclusive fraternity of top NBA draft picks(n)

programme.title: Everything Must Go
programme.desc: Will Ferrell stars as a career salesman who loses his wife and his job on the worst day of his life and must put everything on the line - or the lawn - as he moves his possessions into his front yard in this comedy about what happens after things falls apart. Also stars Rebecca Hall. Based on the short story by Raymond Carver(n)

programme.title: Orange County
programme.desc: The stressful rite of passage known as the college admissions process is gleefully lampooned in this comedy starring Colin Hanks as privileged teen Shaun Brumder, whose sure-fire application to Stanford is botched by his scrambled guidance counselor, leaving him to repair the damage with his slacker brother Lance (Jack Black) and girlfriend Ashley (Schuyler Fisk)(n)

programme.title: Paranoia
programme.desc: When a rising star in the global tech company makes an innocent mistake, he must become a corporate spy to obtain trade secrets from a rival company. But what starts as a clever ruse becomes a life-and-death game of corporate espionage. Stars Liam Hemsworth, Harrison Ford and Gary Oldman(n)

programme.title: A Perfect Day
programme.desc: A group of aid workers tries to resolve a crisis in an armed conflict zone as humor, drama, emotion, routine and danger all fit into one perfect day. Stars Benicio Del Toro and Tim Robbins(n)

programme.title: Love Actually
programme.desc: This classic holiday romantic comedy interweaves the stories of nine contemporary Londoners, from the handsome bachelor Prime Minister who falls for a junior staffer to a schoolboy with a crush, as they wrestle with the funny, poignant and often silly side of love. Stars Laura Linney, Hugh Grant, Emma Thompson, Colin Firth and Alan Rickman(n)

programme.title: Crash
programme.desc: From writer/director Paul Haggis ("Million Dollar Baby") comes this Best Picture Oscar-winning drama that follows the intersecting lives of several Los Angeles natives whose attitudes toward race are challenged by a series of fateful events. Chris "Ludacris" Bridges, Sandra Bullock, Don Cheadle, Matt Dillon, Brendan Fraser, Terrence Howard, Thandie Newton and Ryan Phillippe star in this controversial, critically acclaimed film(n)

programme.title: Saw
programme.desc: A surprise box office smash, this grisly horror tale terrified audiences with its story of two men (Cary Elwes and Leigh Whannell) who awaken imprisoned in the lair of a serial killer nicknamed Jigsaw, who plays vicious mind-games with his victims until he can manipulate them into killing each other. Meanwhile, a pair of desperate detectives (Danny Glover and Ken Leung) try to find the kidnapper before he can carve up his next pair of victims

programme.title: Saw III
programme.desc: The terrifying villain Jigsaw (Tobin Bell) returns for this third entry in the successful horror franchise, this time torturing a brain surgeon who must treat the killer's inoperable brain tumor - or die trying. Meanwhile, Jigsaw has some horror-house tricks up his bloody sleeve for Jeff (Angus Macfadyen), a grieving father whose vengeful spirit is put to the ultimate test. Shawnee Smith costars in this tense sequel

programme.title: Saw IV
programme.desc: The deranged fiend Jigsaw returns from beyond the grave to plague and torment one last crime investigator who can't let go of a new mystery that presents itself while the police are examining the killer's lair. Lyriq Bent, Scott Patterson, Costas Mandylor and Donnie Wahlberg star in the fourth (but by no means final) chapter of the "Saw" series

programme.title: Saw V
programme.desc: The grisly influence of the fiendish serial killer Jigsaw is felt from beyond the grave in this fifth installment of the horror franchise, which finds one of the murderer's survivors teaming up with the murderer's most promising protege. Costas Mandylor and Scott Patterson star with Tobin Bell

programme.desc: On Halloween night, a group of notorious serial killers escape from an asylum and terrorize the patrons of a funhouse carnival - leaving only a rag-tag bunch of kids, a clueless deputy and a local sheriff to stop the carnage

programme.title: The Howling Reborn

This reboot of the "Howling" horror franchise costars Ivana Milicevic

Starring John Goodman, Diane Keaton, Marisa Tomei, Alan Arkin, Olivia Wilde and Ed Helms

programme.title: Love Actually
programme.desc: This classic holiday romantic comedy interweaves the stories of nine contemporary Londoners, from the handsome bachelor Prime Minister who falls for a junior staffer to a schoolboy with a crush, as they wrestle with the funny, poignant and often silly side of love. Stars Laura Linney, Hugh Grant, Emma Thompson, Colin Firth and Alan Rickman

programme.title: The Duff

programme.desc: Comedian Nick Cannon is back - and using his potent voice to attack the haters and naysayers, while discussing everything from the controversial times we're living in to how getting old affects his dating. Plus, there's Nick's scoop on how a trip to Australia was the straw that broke his marriage to Mariah Carey's back. Filmed live at the Ebony Repertory Theatre in South Central Los Angles

programme.title: Fast Times at Ridgemont High
programme.desc: In this classic comedy based on Cameron Crowe's undercover expose on life in a Southern California high school, a group of students wrestle with love, sex, drugs and making their way into the world. Stars Sean Penn, Jennifer Jason Leigh and Phoebe Cates

programme.title: Tyler Perry's Meet the Browns
programme.desc: An inner-city single mother (Angela Bassett) packs up her kids and heads off to visit the crass but surprisingly sweet country cousins she never knew she had in this warm comedy costarring Rick Fox and Sofia Vergara

programme.title: Akeelah and the Bee
programme.desc: A young schoolgirl (Keke Palmer) from South Central Los Angeles discovers a secret, surprising talent for spelling that promises to take her to the National Spelling Bee, with the help of a depressed English professor (Laurence Fishburne) and despite the opposition of her strict, disciplinarian mother (Angela Bassett). Curtis Armstrong and J.R. Villarreal costar in this critically acclaimed drama

programme.title: Blue Crush
programme.desc: An adrenaline fueled surf film starring Kate Bosworth as a former surfing great still reeling from a horrifying injury but at the prodding of her friends, she signs up for a pro surfing competition that could change her life

programme.title: Burnt
programme.desc: Bradley Cooper stars as a former top chef whose drug and alcohol habit led to a career meltdown but he gets a shot at redemption when his former maître d' hires him as the head of his fine-dining restaurant in London. Stars Sienna Miller and Daniel Brühl

programme.title: Weiner
programme.desc: Documentary featuring a jaw-dropping, behind-the-scenes look at the attempted comeback of Anthony Weiner in 2013 as he mounts a campaign for New York City mayor in the wake of his sexting scandal. But it's not long before history repeats itself and new sexting allegations leave Weiner and his aides scrambling to contain the damage. Featuring unfettered access to the candidate and his campaign. Winner of the 2016 Sundance Grand Jury Prize for U.S. Documentary

programme.title: Chicago
programme.desc: At a time when crimes of passion result in celebrity headlines, nightclub sensation Velma Kelly (Catherine Zeta-Jones) and spotlight seeking Roxie Hart (Renee Zellweger) both find themselves sharing space on Chicago's famed Murderess Row. They also share Billy Flynn (Richard Gere), the town's slickest lawyer with a talent for turning notorious defendants into local legends. Winner of 6 Academy Awards®

programme.title: Cinderella Man
programme.desc: Russell Crowe and Renée Zellweger star in this inspiring tale of a promising boxer who battles the odds and a heavyweight champion to support his family during the Depression. Academy Award® winner Ron Howard directs

programme.title: Crash
programme.desc: From writer/director Paul Haggis ("Million Dollar Baby") comes this Best Picture Oscar-winning drama that follows the intersecting lives of several Los Angeles natives whose attitudes toward race are challenged by a series of fateful events. Chris "Ludacris" Bridges, Sandra Bullock, Don Cheadle, Matt Dillon, Brendan Fraser, Terrence Howard, Thandie Newton and Ryan Phillippe star in this controversial, critically acclaimed film

programme.title: TRUMPED: Inside the Greatest Political Upset of All Time
programme.desc: An intimate behind the scenes look into the biggest political upset in recent US history. Mark Halperin, John Heilemann and Mark McKinnon follow the rise of Donald Trump from the primaries through the debates to the drama of election night, featuring a trove of never-before-seen footage secured during the making of the SHOWTIME documentary series 'The Circus.'

programme.title: War
programme.desc: A grieving FBI agent is bent on avenging the death of his partner by hunting down the assassin that pulled the trigger, but uncovers some disturbing secrets on his crusade for justice. Jason Statham and Jet Li star in this stylish action thriller with John Lone

programme.title: Saw IV
programme.desc: The deranged fiend Jigsaw returns from beyond the grave to plague and torment one last crime investigator who can't let go of a new mystery that presents itself while the police are examining the killer's lair. Lyriq Bent, Scott Patterson, Costas Mandylor and Donnie Wahlberg star in the fourth (but by no means final) chapter of the "Saw" series

programme.title: It Follows
programme.desc: After a seemingly innocent sexual encounter, a 19-year-old girl finds herself plagued by nightmarish visions and can't shake the sensation that someone or something is following her. As the threat closes in, she and her friends must escape the horrors that are only a few steps behind

programme.title: Chicago

programme.title: The Caretaker

programme.title: After Words
programme.desc: Academy Award® winner Marcia Gay Harden stars as a librarian who travels to Costa Rica to escape her mid-life crisis and finds herself on an unexpected journey filled with adventure and romance

programme.title: The Discoverers
programme.desc: A washed up history professor takes his begrudging teenage kids on a road trip to a conference, in the hope of getting his career back on track but when his elderly father goes AWOL, he is forced to make a detour on a Lewis and Clark historical reenactment trek, which prompts a family journey of discovery and connection. Stars Lewis Birch and Madeleine Martin

programme.title: Anesthesia
programme.desc: Multiple lives intersect and connect in the aftermath of the brutal assault of a philosophy professor in New York City

programme.title: Veronika Decides to Die

programme.title: Meskada
programme.desc: After a home burglary results in the murder of a young boy, a small town detective is called in to solve the case, one that has galvanized an entire community around the victim's politically powerful mother. Nick Stahl, Rachel Nichols and Kellan Lutz star in this crime thriller

programme.title: Backcountry
programme.desc: A thriller based on a true story about a big city couple who go camping along a secluded Canadian trail and find themselves lost and at the mercy of the wild

programme.title: Good Kill
programme.desc: A Las Vegas-based drone pilot fights the Taliban by remote control for 12 hours a day, then goes home to the suburbs and feuds with his wife and kids for the other 12. But he is starting to question his mission. Is he creating more terrorists than he's killing and will the war ever end? Stars Ethan Hawke and January Jones

programme.title: No Country for Old Men
programme.desc: When a man stumbles upon a bloody crime scene, a pickup truck loaded with heroin and two million dollars in cash, his decision to take the money and run ignites an unstoppable chain reaction of violence and mayhem in writer/director Joel and Ethan Coen's Academy Award winning thriller. Starring Tommy Lee Jones, Javier Bardem and Josh Brolin(n)

programme.title: Caregiver

programme.title: Bleeding
programme.desc: Jackie sleeps with Eddie again but asks him to stop his friendship with Kevin, a request Eddie ignores; a pharmaceutical company rep becomes Jackie's new method of scoring drugs; O'Hara's romance with a reporter heats back up(n)

programme.desc: The hospital's biggest donor is insulted by Coop but dies before she can keep her promise to withdraw her support; Jackie reconsiders her affair with Eddie again when she sees the philandering behavior of O'Hara's lover(n)

programme.desc: Coop sets up his friend Georgia on a date with Eddie, who takes her to Kevin's bar; Grace attends her first session with a psychiatrist; a determined man refuses to leave the emergency room until he says goodbye to his dying husband(n)

programme.title: Lovesick
programme.desc: Matt LeBlanc stars in this comic tale as a man who has everything going for him, except love - which sends him clinically insane the moment he falls for someone. With the help of his friends and his wacky neighbor, he must find a way to overcome his psychosis to claim his chance at true love. Also stars Chevy Chase(n)

programme.desc: While camping in the ruins of an ancient Turkish town, an innocent game turns deadly for a group of friends(n)

programme.title: Madonna: Rebel Heart Tour
programme.desc: Concert special featuring the iconic superstar as she performs in packed arenas around the globe. programme.title: Bert Kreischer: The Machine
programme.desc: Stand-up comedy special featuring inimitable storyteller Bert Kreisher, who expounds on a series of incredible and hilarious tales - from an unforgettable run-in with a grizzly bear to his legendary travels in Russia(n)

programme.title: The Cookout
programme.desc: After he signs a $30 million NBA contract, number-one draft pick Todd Anderson (Storm P) decides to celebrate by inviting his many friends and family to his luxurious mansion for a big cookout - a raucous party that doesn't go over so well with his snooty neighbor the judge (Danny Glover) or his gated community's overly alert security guard (Queen Latifah). Eve, Ja Rule, Farrah Fawcett, Tim Meadows and Jonathan Silverman co-star in this "Barbershop"-style comedy, based on a story by Latifah, who also served as executive producer(n)

programme.title: Weiner
programme.desc: Documentary featuring a jaw-dropping, behind-the-scenes look at the attempted comeback of Anthony Weiner in 2013 as he mounts a campaign for New York City mayor in the wake of his sexting scandal. programme.title: The Hurt Locker

Jeremy Renner, Anthony Mackie and Brian Geraghty star in this acclaimed, tension-filled journey into the heart of darkness

programme.desc: Revenge thriller starring Anthony Hopkins as a man haunted by the memory of his daughter's death, who comes to the aid of a young woman who is being viciously harassed by a rogue cop. Co-stars Julia Stiles and Ray Liotta

Chris "Ludacris" Bridges, Sandra Bullock, Don Cheadle, Matt Dillon, Brendan Fraser, Terrence Howard, Thandie Newton and Ryan Phillippe star in this controversial, critically acclaimed film

programme.title: Cabin Fever
programme.desc: In this classic horror, a group of college friends retreat to a remote cabin in the woods for one last week of partying, only to find themselves snacks for a gruesome flesh-eating virus(n)

programme.title: Showtime Championship Boxing: Wilder vs. Szpilka (R) (?)
The Hateful Eight
programme.desc: Eight strangers seek refuge from a blizzard in this Western mystery from writer and director Quentin Tarantino. Features an all-star cast, including Samuel L. Jackson, Kurt Russell and Jennifer Jason Leigh(n)

programme.title: Drug War
programme.desc: A Chinese-Hong Kong crime thriller about a police captain who teams up with a drug manufacturer to go undercover so that he can bust a notorious drug lord but finds himself drawn into a dangerous battle of wits(n)

programme.title: Spy Game
programme.desc: Academy Award®-winner Robert Redford stars as a CIA maverick who is on the brink of retirement from the field when he learns that his protégé (Brad Pitt) has been arrested in China on a charge of espionage and he must find a way to free him(n)

programme.title: Running For His Life: The Lawrence Phillips Story
programme.desc: Feature length documentary examining the troubled life and tragic death of college football standout and talented NFL running back Lawrence Phillips, whose scars of childhood abuse and abandonment haunted him throughout his career(n)

programme.title: Meat Loaf: In and Out of Hell
programme.desc: Documentary featuring an intimate profile of American rock legend Meat Loaf, spanning from his childhood of domestic violence, through a decade of rejection by record companies to global fame, bust-ups and a major comeback. Features friends, family and fellow musicians offering a candid, gritty and humorous profile of the overweight bullied kid who became a music icon(n)

programme.title: Maz Jobrani: I'm Not a Terrorist But I've Played One on TV
programme.desc: Comedian Maz Jobrani follows up his bestselling book with a hilarious comedy special of the same title, where he takes on political issues, social issues and his kids through the lens of his Iranian-American background to show that we have a lot more in common than we think(n)

programme.title: Blue Crush
programme.desc: An adrenaline fueled surf film starring Kate Bosworth as a former surfing great still reeling from a horrifying injury but at the prodding of her friends, she signs up for a pro surfing competition that could change her life(n)

programme.title: Pound of Flesh
programme.desc: Jean-Claude Van Damme stars as a former black ops agent who has traveled to South Asia to donate a kidney to his dying niece but wakes to find that he is the latest victim of organ theft, forcing him to carve a blood soaked path through the darkest corners of the city to find the culprits, in a race against the clock(n)

programme.title: Running For His Life: The Lawrence Phillips Story
programme.desc: Feature length documentary examining the troubled life and tragic death of college football standout and talented NFL running back Lawrence Phillips, whose scars of childhood abuse and abandonment haunted him throughout his career(n)

programme.title: Good Kill
programme.desc: A Las Vegas-based drone pilot fights the Taliban by remote control for 12 hours a day, then goes home to the suburbs and feuds with his wife and kids for the other 12. But he is starting to question his mission. Is he creating more terrorists than he's killing and will the war ever end? Stars Ethan Hawke and January Jones(n)

programme.title: Blue Crush
programme.desc: An adrenaline fueled surf film starring Kate Bosworth as a former surfing great still reeling from a horrifying injury but at the prodding of her friends, she signs up for a pro surfing competition that could change her life(n)

programme.title: The Cookout
programme.desc: After he signs a $30 million NBA contract, number-one draft pick Todd Anderson (Storm P) decides to celebrate by inviting his many friends and family to his luxurious mansion for a big cookout - a raucous party that doesn't go over so well with his snooty neighbor the judge (Danny Glover) or his gated community's overly alert security guard (Queen Latifah). Eve, Ja Rule, Farrah Fawcett, Tim Meadows and Jonathan Silverman co-star in this "Barbershop"-style comedy, based on a story by Latifah, who also served as executive producer

programme.title: Akeelah and the Bee
programme.desc: A young schoolgirl (Keke Palmer) from South Central Los Angeles discovers a secret, surprising talent for spelling that promises to take her to the National Spelling Bee, with the help of a depressed English professor (Laurence Fishburne) and despite the opposition of her strict, disciplinarian mother (Angela Bassett). Curtis Armstrong and J.R. Villarreal costar in this critically acclaimed drama

programme.title: Paper Planes
programme.desc: An imaginative young Australian boy discovers that his talent for folding and flying paper planes could take him to the World Paper Plane Championships to compete against powerful rivals. Stars Sam Worthington

programme.title: The Accidental Spy
programme.desc: Jackie Chan stars in this globe-trotting adventure as a sporting goods salesman whose dream of being an international spy comes true when he foils a bank robbery and is recruited to search for a missing person in Korea, where he uncovers a plot involving a hidden fortune and a stolen weapon of mass destruction. Eric Tsang and Vivian Hsu costar

programme.title: The Cookout
programme.desc: After he signs a $30 million NBA contract, number-one draft pick Todd Anderson (Storm P) decides to celebrate by inviting his many friends and family to his luxurious mansion for a big cookout - a raucous party that doesn't go over so well with his snooty neighbor the judge (Danny Glover) or his gated community's overly alert security guard (Queen Latifah). Eve, Ja Rule, Farrah Fawcett, Tim Meadows and Jonathan Silverman co-star in this "Barbershop"-style comedy, based on a story by Latifah, who also served as executive producer

programme.title: In a Perfect World
programme.desc: Documentary that explores the dynamics of what it is to be a man raised by a single mother told through the lens of the director's own relationship with her solo-parented son. Features interviews with men of diverse backgrounds and ages, sharing painfully personal anecdotes in the wake of emotionally turbulent and unsettling periods of their youth. This story is both a deeply personal and introspective portrait of a modern family, as well as a probing cinematic essay examining one of society's major ailments

programme.title: Christmas Ranch
programme.desc: When a rebellious young girl is sent to stay on her grandmother's ranch for Christmas, a friendship with a pony alters the course of her life but when the ranch is threatened with foreclosure she must come up with a plan to save horse and home

programme.title: Dean Smith
programme.desc: Coach, mentor, social activist ...the life and legacy of Dean Smith, North Carolina's legendary basketball coach - who went to 11 Finals Fours and won two National Championships, with players like Michael Jordan, James Worthy, Vince Carter and Jerry Stackhouse - is remembered and celebrated by former players and colleagues

programme.title: Star Trek II: The Wrath of Khan
programme.desc: In this classic movie spin off from the TV series, Admiral Kirk escapes the tedium of his desk job to embark on another space mission and crosses path with his old enemy, Khan, who is on a mission to destroy the Enterprise, even if it means universal Armageddon. Stars William Shatner and Leonard Nimoy

programme.title: Molly Moon and the Incredible Book of Hypnotism
programme.desc: A young orphan girl, Molly Moon, learns hypnotism from a book, catapulting her to fame and wealth in London. But little does she know that there's an unscrupulous bank robber who'll stop at nothing to get her book

programme.title: Arctic Tale
programme.desc: The producers of "March of the Penguins" and "An Inconvenient Truth" team up to present this dazzling documentary that chronicles the endangered life cycles of a walrus and a polar bear, whose frozen habitats are rapidly disappearing thanks to global warming

programme.title: I Am Giant: Victor Cruz
programme.desc: Documentary chronicling Victor Cruz's improbable rise to football stardom, the life shattering injury that derailed his career and his dramatic attempt at a comeback, revealing the man behind the mask, as he faces the biggest challenge of his life

programme.title: Life of a King
programme.desc: Based on an inspiring true story, Academy Award® winner Cuba Gooding Jr. stars as a man released from prison after 18 years, who starts a chess club to keep inner-city youth from the streets and give them what he never had: a future

programme.title: The Hunters
programme.desc: After the disappearance of two famous treasure hunters who protect the objects from ancient fairy tales from an evil force, it's up to their two sons to find Snow White's mirror before it falls into the wrong hands

programme.title: Hot Rod

Sissy Spacek, Ian McShane, Isla Fisher, Jorma Tacone, Bill Hader, Danny McBride and Will Parnell costar in this likable, goofy comedy

programme.title: Hidden In America
programme.desc: When a factory worker and recently widowed father (Beau Bridges) is laid off, he sacrifices his family's welfare for the sake of pride. However, a concerned doctor (Bruce Davison) tries to intervene. Jeff Bridges and Frances McDormand costar in this drama

programme.title: Black Filmmaker Showcase: Among Thieves
programme.desc: Hiding out from the police, a thief meets a bedridden senior citizen who begs him to end her life in this short from filmmaker Oscar Daniels

programme.title: Whiskers
programme.desc: Eleven-year-old Jed (Michael Caloz) arranges for the Egyptian goddess of felines to turn his cuddly cat into a kid. However, since cat years and human years figure differently, "Whiskers" is now a thirty-year-old man. Jacob Tierney costars in this cat comedy

programme.title: Latino Filmmaker Showcase: Candy and Brandy
programme.desc: A couple's relationship endures a dramatic confrontation that leads to a painful breakup - a situation most notable for the fact that they are portrayed by children in this award-winning tone poem from Spanish filmmaker Ander Duque

programme.title: Latino Filmmaker Showcase: Wilbur
programme.desc: A lonely, stuttering London baker who is still something of a mama's boy despite being his thirties pines for love in this quirky comedy from AFI student Dago Rodriguez

programme.title: Play It Forward
programme.desc: SHOWTIME Sports presents an emotional story of family, sacrifice and the pursuit of your dreams as candidly told through the lives of legendary NFL tight end and future Hall of Fame inductee Tony Gonzalez and his older brother Chris

programme.title: Ronnie & Julie
programme.desc: Teenagers who meet thanks to a mutual interest in ice-skating (he's a hockey player, she's a figure skater) proceed to fall head over heels in love, jeopardizing a local election for their rival political families. Joshua Jackson and Margot Finlay star with Teri Garr and Alexandra Purvis in this contemporary reworking of Shakespeare's "Romeo and Juliet."

programme.title: Christmas Eve
programme.desc: In this all-star family comedy, a power outage traps six groups of New Yorkers in elevators on Christmas Eve where they find that laughter, romance and a little bit of faith might get them through – and change their lives in unexpected ways. Stars Patrick Stewart and Jon Heder

programme.title: A.R.C.H.I.E.

programme.title: What Women Want

Alan Alda, Marisa Tomei, Lauren Holly, Ashley Johnson and Mark Feuerstein costar in this comedy blockbuster(n)

programme.title: The Ladykillers (2004)
programme.desc: Academy Award® winner Tom Hanks stars in this Coen Brothers slapstick comedy as a devious criminal hiding beneath the persona of a silver-tongued southern gentleman so that he can commit the heist of the century by tunneling through his churchgoing landlady's cellar to a casino's vault of riches

programme.title: Fight Valley
programme.desc: When a young woman is found dead after getting involved in an underground fighting ring, her sister begins training under a respected ex-fighter to bring justice to the killer

programme.title: Helicopter Mom
programme.desc: A teenage boy must come to terms with his overbearing, meddling mother, who involves herself in every aspect of his life from prom to submitting him for an LGBT scholarship because she thinks he might be gay

programme.title: Ginger & Rosa
programme.desc: Two inseparable teenage girls growing up in 1960s London as the Cuban Missile Crisis looms explore friendship, activism and budding desire and encounter a pivotal event that will redefine their friendship. Stars Elle Fanning, Annette Bening and Oliver Platt

programme.title: Ping Pong Summer
programme.desc: In this coming of age comedy, a family vacation during the summer of 1985 changes everything for a shy teenage boy obsessed with ping pong

programme.title: Walking on Sunshine
programme.desc: Love, sun, lust and 80s hit songs collide in this musical romantic comedy set on the stunning coast of Italy, where a young woman is on the precipice of marrying her gorgeous fiancé, not knowing he had a fling with her sister

programme.title: The Ladies Man
programme.desc: Hilarious "Saturday Night Live" spin-off starring Tim Meadows as Leon Phelps, a swinging throwback to the '70s enjoying his life as a Don Juan of the airwaves, dispensing naughty sex advice via his radio show. When he's fired for his politically incorrect ways, Leon seeks out an anonymous former lover who's offered to be his sugar mama, while he tries to dodge a mob of angry husbands whose wives have enjoyed intimate relations with the "ladies man." Karyn Parsons, Will Ferrell, Billy Dee Williams, Julianne Moore and John Witherspoon costar

programme.desc: When a woman discovers her boyfriend is cheating on her with her best friend, she plans a romantic weekend getaway for just the three of them, complete with terror, torture and twisted psychosexual games. Stars AnnaLynne McCord and Billy Zane

programme.title: Big Eyes

programme.title: The Outlaw Josey Wales

programme.title: Papillon

programme.title: A Patch of Blue

programme.title: Pennies from Heaven

programme.title: Possessed

programme.title: Notorious
programme.desc: From his beginnings on the mean streets of Brooklyn to becoming an East Coast hip-hop sensation, the life and death of rapper Notorious B.I.G. is chronicled in this biopic

programme.title: Get Rich or Die Tryin'
programme.desc: Saga of a street kid turned drug dealer turned rap artist, loosely based on the life of hip-hop star Calvin "50 Cent" Jackson, who basically plays himself

programme.title: ATL
programme.desc: A tightly knit group of working-class Atlanta teens spend their time bonding over hip-hop and roller skating while pondering life after high school amidst the mean streets they live in

programme.title: The Breaks
programme.desc: Three friends pursue careers in the hip-hop industry in New York City during the 1990s. (repeat)

programme.title: Love & Hip Hop
programme.desc: In the Season 7 finale, the women in Mendeecees' life get together for a final sit-down; Sky gives Drewski a dose of his own medicine; and Swift reveals his feelings to Cardi B. (repeat)

programme.title: My Wife and Kids
programme.desc: Michael doesn't think that modeling's a wise career choice for Claire, but when an agent (Carole Davis) tells him he has the perfect equipment to be a hand model, he thinks it's fine for him. Meanwhile, Kady's spending time with a girl named Rachel (Liliana Mumy), making Franklin very jealous. (repeat)

programme.title: My Wife and Kids
programme.desc: It's “game night” at the Kyle house, but it isn't exactly fun and games when the couples play “What Do You Know?” “What You Don't Know” would be more like it. “There's this weird energy here,” moans Michael. Vanessa: Brooklyn Sudano. Jasmine: Ella Joyce. Calvin: Rasta. Tony: Andrew McFarlane. Franklin: Noah Gray-Cabey. (repeat)

programme.title: My Wife and Kids
programme.desc: Part 1 of two. Vanessa (Brooklyn Sudano) is more than a little bit pregnant. In fact, she's a week overdue. She wants a natural childbirth at home, presided over by a new-agey midwife named Summer Breeze (Kelly Coffield). Fat chance of that happening. Meanwhile, Claire suspects Kady of pilfering her perfume and lipstick. (repeat)

programme.title: My Wife and Kids
programme.desc: Conclusion. Following Vanessa's false labor (and the chaos it caused), Michael scripts a “game plan” for the real thing. “This has to work like clockwork,” he declares. Meanwhile, Claire and Kady, having made up, go off on a shopping spree together. Vanessa: Brooklyn Sudano. (repeat)

programme.title: The Jamie Foxx Show
programme.desc: The pressures of being a supervisor affect the quality of Jamie's jingles, so he passes off one of Mouse's ideas as his own, which leads to a guilt-filled dream about his future. Mouse: Suli McCullough. Bob: Blake Clark. Fancy: Garcelle Beauvais. (repeat)

programme.title: The Jamie Foxx Show
programme.desc: To cover the medical costs of an injured friend (Bill Bellamy), Jamie signs insurance forms that claim he and his friend are life partners, which leads to a misinterpreted party invitation. Nicole: Rhona L. Bennett. Dorian: Robert Curtis Brown. Phil: Alex Thomas. Mouse: Suli McCullough. Fancy: Garcelle Beauvais. (repeat)

programme.title: The Jamie Foxx Show
programme.sub-title: Hot Coco on a Cold Night
programme.desc: Fancy fulfills a fantasy for Jamie by waiting on him hand and foot, and he begins to prefer his dream lover to the real thing. He expects his girlfriend to pamper him continually, which leads to an embarrassing display of attention during an important business dinner. Hawkins: Scott Atkinson. Edwin: Lenny Wolte. Shannon: June Christopher. Fancy: Garcelle Beauvais. Braxton: Christopher B. Duncan. Helen: Ellia English. (repeat)

programme.title: The Jamie Foxx Show
programme.desc: Jamie advises Braxton's financial group to invest in a doughnut franchise, but Braxton balks at the idea, causing the other members of the group to kick him out. Milton: Lawrence Hilton-Jacobs. Gloria: Karen Maruyama. Curtis: Chris Spencer. Fancy: Garcelle Beauvais. (repeat)

programme.title: The Fresh Prince of Bel-Air
programme.desc: After being accepted at Princeton, Carlton fears he won't measure up and changes the direction of his career---to bowling. Rhonda: Doreen Brown. Carlton: Alfonso Ribeiro. Madge: Darlene Kardon. Philip: James Avery. (repeat)

programme.title: The Fresh Prince of Bel-Air
programme.desc: Geoffrey's life changes overnight when a young man (Craig Kirkwood) claiming to be his son shows up at the mansion and charms everyone---except Will, who discovers the guy's not what he seems. Geoffrey: Joseph Marcell. (repeat)

programme.title: The Fresh Prince of Bel-Air
programme.desc: Will is shocked to spy the church's esteemed reverend (Richard Roundtree) making a play for Vivian (Daphne Maxwell Reid). Choirmaster Hawkins: Cal Gibson. Rose: Jeri Gray. Etta: Loretta Jean. Will: Will Smith. (repeat)

programme.title: The Fresh Prince of Bel-Air
programme.desc: Philip expects Ashley to decline an offer for a degrading role in an ad by a director who could get her into a top school. Frank: Allan Wasserman. Ashley: Tatyana M. Ali. Philip: James Avery. Will: Will Smith. (repeat)

programme.title: ATL
programme.desc: A tightly knit group of working-class Atlanta teens spend their time bonding over hip-hop and roller skating while pondering life after high school amidst the mean streets they live in

programme.title: Black Ink Crew
programme.desc: Walt tries to persuade Richard to deal with his legal matters; and Ceaser's caught off guard when Donna demands her job back. Later, Dutchess returns to New York City to celebrate her magazine cover. (repeat)

programme.title: Love & Hip Hop
programme.desc: Amina gives birth to her baby; Cardi receives a letter from Tommy; and Kimbella's friendship with Yandy is pulled into her relationship problems with Juelz. Later, Remy Ma surprises Papoose with a gift. (repeat)

programme.title: Love & Hip Hop
programme.desc: Part 1 of 2. The ladies arrive in Mexico, but Yandy brings an uninvited guest who fuels her feud with Kimbella. Later, Juju's book stirs up drama; and Self exacts revenge on Cisco back in New York. (repeat)

programme.title: Love & Hip Hop
programme.desc: Conclusion. Yandy confronts Juju again; Tara and Amina see each other for the first time in more than one year; and Samantha's reeling from a visit to Mendeecees. Later, Yandy doesn't show up at Lil Mendeecees' birthday party. (repeat)

programme.title: Love & Hip Hop
programme.desc: In the Season 7 finale, the women in Mendeecees' life get together for a final sit-down; Sky gives Drewski a dose of his own medicine; and Swift reveals his feelings to Cardi B. (repeat)

programme.desc: Part 1 of 2. Mo'Nique hosts a reunion featuring the regrouped cast discussing Season 4's dramas. (repeat)

programme.title: Godzina z...
programme.desc: Zbiór praktycznych porad dotyczących życia. Twórcy radzą m.in., jak przygotować coś dobrego do jedzenia lub zrobić ciekawy prezent bądź przydatny gadżet z rozmaitych przedmiotów codziennego użytku

programme.title: Kulinarne notatki z podróży Rachel Khoo: Londyn
programme.sub-title: Kulinarne notatki z podróży Rachel Khoo: Londyn (odc. 9)
programme.desc: Znawczyni gotowania Rachel Khoo powraca w swoje rodzinne strony, do Londynu, w poszukiwaniu kulinarnych inspiracji. Miłośnicy talentu słynnej Brytyjki nie będą zawiedzeni. Podróż po tętniącej życiem brytyjskiej stolicy to zarówno dla prowadzącej, jak i widzów pełne intrygujących doznań, widoków, dźwięków, oraz rzecz jasna smaków, niezapomniane doświadczenie zamknięte w dziesięciu inspirujących odcinkach. Rachel odwiedza urządzoną w prywatnej piwnicy wędzarnię łososi. Gości też w sklepie, w którym można kupić przetwory robione na zamówienie

programme.title: Trinny i Susannah ubierają Norwegię
programme.desc: Brytyjskie ekspertki stylu Trinny Woodall i Susannah Constantine podróżują po całym świecie, pomagając zaniedbanym kobietom przeobrazić się w ikony stylu. Tym razem jadą do Norwegii

programme.title: Modowa sprawa narodowa
programme.desc: Cekiny, róże i tygrysie cętki - o tym i wielu innych przykładach złego gustu na zawsze zapomni każda z uczestniczek programu. Sztab specjalistów zadba o to, by z ich szaf zniknęły kiczowate ubrania

programme.title: No Limit
programme.desc: Drugi sezon serialu o najlepszym francuskim agencie wywiadu, który dowiaduje, że choruje na nowotwór mózgu. Vincent Libérati (Vincent Elbaz) rezygnuje z pracy, by spędzić pozostały mu czas w Marsylii, gdzie towarzyszą mu była żona Alexandra (Hélene Seuzaret) i córka Lola (Sarah Brannens). Vincent bierze udział w tajnych misjach. Dzięki temu zyska możliwość wzięcia udziału w eksperymentalnym leczeniu guza. Opuszczony przez wszystkich, ścigany przez własną siostrę i władze, Vincent ma zaledwie cztery godziny, by powstrzymać zamach. Jeżeli mu się nie uda, wśród ofiar znajdą się jego była żona Alexandra i ich nastoletnia córka, Lola(r)

programme.title: 24 godziny online.pl
programme.desc: Reporterzy z całej Polski prezentują aktualne wydarzenia z kraju oraz ze świata. Każdego dnia widzowie otrzymają zestaw sprawdzonych informacji, które mogą mieć znaczący wpływ na ich życie

programme.title: Nowa Rewia Kabaretowa
programme.desc: W programie wystąpią najlepsi rodzimi specjaliści od dobrego humoru, m.in. Formacja Chatelet, Łowcy.B, Koń Polski, Kabaret pod Wyrwigroszem, Elita, Kabaret Skeczów Męczących i grupa Nowaki. Pojawią się liczni goście, a także sceniczne osobowości - Krzysztof Piasecki, Tomasz Jachimek, Jerzy Kryszak, Katarzyna Pakosińska i Andrzej Grabowski. Grupa Nowaki przedstawi swoje największe hity kabaretowe. Widzowie poznają cały wachlarz absurdalnych sytuacji i zaskakujących postaci, które stanowią zabawny komentarz do współczesnych wydarzeń

programme.title: Mercy Street
programme.desc: Jedowi udaje się zdać egzamin. Ma okazję wypróbować swoje medyczne zdolności, gdy do miasteczka przyjeżdżają jego matka i brat - ranny żołnierz konfederackiej armii. Dostarczane przez Silasa posiłki nie wystarczą dla wszystkich pacjentów szpitala, dlatego Mary postanawia sama zająć się przygotowywaniem jedzenia. Alice jest w szoku, kiedy odkrywa, jak bardzo wojna zmieniła jej narzeczonego, Toma. Aurelia zachodzi w ciążę z Silasem. Ona i Samuel wspólnie starają się przekonać młodego niewolnika, by skorzystał z okazji i spróbował odzyskać wolność

programme.title: Wydział operacji specjalnych
programme.desc: Daniel ma rozpracować gang rabusiów, którzy dopuścili się zabójstwa podczas napadu na bank. Funkcjonariusz przybiera fałszywą tożsamość

programme.title: Sala operacyjna
programme.desc: 40-letni ksiądz Marcin to klasyczny przypadek osoby uzależnionej od jedzenia. Wiele razy podejmował próbę walki z otyłością. Niestety, obżarstwo zawsze wygrywało ze zdrowym rozsądkiem. Pierwszą operację zmniejszenia żołądka przeszedł parę lat temu. Zrzucił wtedy kilkadziesiąt kilogramów. Odzyskał kondycję i sprawność fizyczną. Szansę jednak na normalne życie stracił na własne życzenie. Powoli przyzwyczajał żołądek do chorobliwego objadania się, co doprowadziło do jeszcze większej nadwagi. Marcin zdecydował się na kolejną operację. Za jakiś czas również wrócił do nałogu jedzenia. Podjął trzecia próbę. Kamera towarzyszy Marcinowi i lekarzom podczas przygotowań i samej operacji zmniejszenia żołądka

programme.title: Panny młode z piekła rodem
programme.desc: Twórcy serii w każdym odcinku przybliżają widzom gorączkowe ślubne przygotowania kolejnej pary narzeczonych. Zwłaszcza przyszłe panny młode są zdeterminowane, aby mieć idealny ślub. Dla wszystkich, którzy stają im na drodze są złośliwe, wymagające i egoistyczne. Aby zrealizować swój cel, są gotowe zapomnieć o skrupułach czy sentymentach. Wszystko bowiem ma być tak, jak to one sobie wymarzyły!

programme.sub-title: Kulinarne notatki z podróży Rachel Khoo: Londyn (odc. 10)

programme.title: Trinny i Susannah ubierają Norwegię

programme.title: Modowa sprawa narodowa
programme.desc: Cekiny, róże i tygrysie cętki - o tym i wielu innych przykładach złego gustu na zawsze zapomni każda z uczestniczek programu. Sztab specjalistów zadba o to, by z ich szaf zniknęły kiczowate ubrania

programme.title: No Limit
programme.desc: Vincent potrzebuje przeszczepu wątroby. Udaje mu się namierzyć swojego ojca Claude'a, który byłby idealnym dawcą. Okazuje się, że Libérati senior, słynny marsylski kryminalista, jest w boliwijskim więzieniu. Vincent chce go stamtąd wyciągnąć, ten jednak odmawia pomocy synowi. Tymczasem Gandel usiłuje wykorzystać dawne znajomości Claude'a do wyjaśnienia sprawy fałszywych pieniędzy, w którą zamieszany jest znany marsylski polityk, Jacques Brunetti. Vincent łączy siły z Juliette i razem dokonują przełomowego odkrycia w śledztwie(r)

programme.title: No Limit
programme.desc: Vincent potrzebuje przeszczepu wątroby. Udaje mu się namierzyć swojego ojca Claude'a, który byłby idealnym dawcą. programme.title: Sala operacyjna
programme.desc: U 65-letniej Urszuli wykryto dwa tętniaki mózgu. Uciążliwy ból szyi nie zwiastował poważnej diagnozy. Wcześniej jeden z lekarzy zlecił wykonanie rezonansu magnetycznego kręgosłupa szyjnego, ale nie dostrzegł niczego niepokojącego. Zabiegi i leki nie przyniosły jednak poprawy. Ula zasięgnęła porady kolejnego specjalisty i dopiero ten zauważył na obrazie z rezonansu obecność dwóch tętniaków. Kilka lat wcześniej podobną diagnozę usłyszała jej córka Iza. Kobieta miała operację zabezpieczenia jednego tętniaka mózgu. Na szczęście wszystko dobrze się skończyło. Teraz Ula czeka na zabieg. Niestety, nie ma przy niej córki, która pracuje w Londynie. Ula gorąco wierzy, że operacja się powiedzie

programme.title: Jej Szerokość Afrodyta
programme.desc: Grayson wraca do zdrowia po wypadku. Parker prosi Jane o pomoc Kim w sprawie matki nastoletniej Sary. Dziewczyna zmarła podczas operacji. Prawniczka zamierza pozwać placówkę o błąd w sztuce medycznej(n)

programme.title: No Limit
programme.desc: Dalsze losy francuskiego agenta Vincenta Libérati (Vincent Elbaz). Po dwóch latach służby w tajnej rządowej agencji Hydra Vincent chce zmienić swoje życie. Udało mu się pokonać nowotwór i nie chce podejmować się kolejnych sekretnych misji. Marzy o tym, by wrócić do byłej żony Alexandry (Hélene Seuzaret) i być obecnym w życiu ich córki Loli (Sarah Brannens). Jednak podczas swojej ostatniej akcji Vincent zostaje wystawiony na działanie trującego gazu, który uszkadza jego wątrobę. Konieczny jest pilny przeszczep. Dawcą może zostać jedynie ojciec Vincenta. Problem w tym, że nie są oni w najlepszych stosunkach, a na dodatek Claude Libérati (Patrick Chesnais) przebywa w kolumbijskim więzieniu(n)

programme.title: No Limit
programme.desc: Dalsze losy francuskiego agenta Vincenta Libérati (Vincent Elbaz). Po dwóch latach służby w tajnej rządowej agencji Hydra Vincent chce zmienić swoje życie. programme.title: Z pamiętnika lekarki
programme.desc: Nie dane było Gretchen cieszyć się miesiącem miodowym w ramionach swojego męża. Wszyscy obecni w kościele muszą przejść kwarantannę z powodu epidemii. Kaan nie radzi sobie ze sprawowaniem nadzoru(n)

programme.title: Wojna w Dolomitach
programme.desc: Maj 1915 roku, Południowy Tyrol. Na ślubie swojej siostry Andrel Gruber (William Moseley) poznaje piękną Włoszkę Franceskę Calzolari (Eugenia Costantini). Zakochuje się w niej od pierwszego wejrzenia. Tego samego dnia Włochy wypowiadają wojnę Austro-Węgrom. Żeby uratować swoje życie, Francesca zostaje kochanką miejscowego nauczyciela, Fritza Weinbergera (Fritz Karl). Kiedy Andrel dowiaduje się o ich romansie, rusza na front i o własnych siłach odpiera atak włoskiej piechoty. Tymczasem Austriakom udaje się pochwycić Angelo Calzolariego (Giulio Cristini), brata Franceski. Po uwolnieniu jeńca on i Andrel spieszą na ratunek dziewczynie. Tylko jednemu z nich uda się dotrzeć do celu wyprawy(n)

programme.title: Nowa Ja!
programme.desc: Iza nie umie porozumiewać się z ludźmi. Jest skupiona na sobie, uważa że powinna być zawsze w centrum uwagi. Nigdy nie próbowała się dopasować. Oczekuje, że to ludzie muszą się do niej dostosować(n)

programme.title: Panny młode z piekła rodem

Dla wszystkich, którzy stają im na drodze są złośliwe, wymagające i egoistyczne. Aby zrealizować swój cel, są gotowe zapomnieć o skrupułach czy sentymentach. Wszystko bowiem ma być tak, jak to one sobie wymarzyły!(n)

programme.title: Godzina z...
programme.desc: Zbiór praktycznych porad dotyczących życia. Twórcy radzą m.in., jak przygotować coś dobrego do jedzenia lub zrobić ciekawy prezent bądź przydatny gadżet z rozmaitych przedmiotów codziennego użytku

programme.title: Kulinarne notatki z podróży Rachel Khoo: Londyn
programme.sub-title: Kulinarne notatki z podróży Rachel Khoo: Londyn (odc. 9)
programme.desc: Znawczyni gotowania Rachel Khoo powraca w swoje rodzinne strony, do Londynu, w poszukiwaniu kulinarnych inspiracji. Miłośnicy talentu słynnej Brytyjki nie będą zawiedzeni. Podróż po tętniącej życiem brytyjskiej stolicy to zarówno dla prowadzącej, jak i widzów pełne intrygujących doznań, widoków, dźwięków, oraz rzecz jasna smaków, niezapomniane doświadczenie zamknięte w dziesięciu inspirujących odcinkach. Rachel odwiedza urządzoną w prywatnej piwnicy wędzarnię łososi. Gości też w sklepie, w którym można kupić przetwory robione na zamówienie

programme.title: Trinny i Susannah ubierają Norwegię
programme.desc: Brytyjskie ekspertki stylu Trinny Woodall i Susannah Constantine podróżują po całym świecie, pomagając zaniedbanym kobietom przeobrazić się w ikony stylu. Tym razem jadą do Norwegii

programme.title: Modowa sprawa narodowa
programme.desc: Cekiny, róże i tygrysie cętki - o tym i wielu innych przykładach złego gustu na zawsze zapomni każda z uczestniczek programu. Sztab specjalistów zadba o to, by z ich szaf zniknęły kiczowate ubrania

programme.title: No Limit
programme.desc: Drugi sezon serialu o najlepszym francuskim agencie wywiadu, który dowiaduje, że choruje na nowotwór mózgu. Vincent Libérati (Vincent Elbaz) rezygnuje z pracy, by spędzić pozostały mu czas w Marsylii, gdzie towarzyszą mu była żona Alexandra (Hélene Seuzaret) i córka Lola (Sarah Brannens). Vincent bierze udział w tajnych misjach. Dzięki temu zyska możliwość wzięcia udziału w eksperymentalnym leczeniu guza. Opuszczony przez wszystkich, ścigany przez własną siostrę i władze, Vincent ma zaledwie cztery godziny, by powstrzymać zamach. Jeżeli mu się nie uda, wśród ofiar znajdą się jego była żona Alexandra i ich nastoletnia córka, Lola(r)

programme.title: 24 godziny online.pl
programme.desc: Reporterzy z całej Polski prezentują aktualne wydarzenia z kraju oraz ze świata. Każdego dnia widzowie otrzymają zestaw sprawdzonych informacji, które mogą mieć znaczący wpływ na ich życie

programme.title: Nowa Rewia Kabaretowa
programme.desc: W programie wystąpią najlepsi rodzimi specjaliści od dobrego humoru, m.in. Formacja Chatelet, Łowcy.B, Koń Polski, Kabaret pod Wyrwigroszem, Elita, Kabaret Skeczów Męczących i grupa Nowaki. Pojawią się liczni goście, a także sceniczne osobowości - Krzysztof Piasecki, Tomasz Jachimek, Jerzy Kryszak, Katarzyna Pakosińska i Andrzej Grabowski. Grupa Nowaki przedstawi swoje największe hity kabaretowe. Widzowie poznają cały wachlarz absurdalnych sytuacji i zaskakujących postaci, które stanowią zabawny komentarz do współczesnych wydarzeń

programme.title: Mercy Street
programme.desc: Jedowi udaje się zdać egzamin. Ma okazję wypróbować swoje medyczne zdolności, gdy do miasteczka przyjeżdżają jego matka i brat - ranny żołnierz konfederackiej armii. Dostarczane przez Silasa posiłki nie wystarczą dla wszystkich pacjentów szpitala, dlatego Mary postanawia sama zająć się przygotowywaniem jedzenia. Alice jest w szoku, kiedy odkrywa, jak bardzo wojna zmieniła jej narzeczonego, Toma. Aurelia zachodzi w ciążę z Silasem. Ona i Samuel wspólnie starają się przekonać młodego niewolnika, by skorzystał z okazji i spróbował odzyskać wolność

programme.title: Wydział operacji specjalnych
programme.desc: Daniel ma rozpracować gang rabusiów, którzy dopuścili się zabójstwa podczas napadu na bank. Funkcjonariusz przybiera fałszywą tożsamość

programme.title: Sala operacyjna
programme.desc: 40-letni ksiądz Marcin to klasyczny przypadek osoby uzależnionej od jedzenia. Wiele razy podejmował próbę walki z otyłością. Niestety, obżarstwo zawsze wygrywało ze zdrowym rozsądkiem. Pierwszą operację zmniejszenia żołądka przeszedł parę lat temu. Zrzucił wtedy kilkadziesiąt kilogramów. Odzyskał kondycję i sprawność fizyczną. Szansę jednak na normalne życie stracił na własne życzenie. Powoli przyzwyczajał żołądek do chorobliwego objadania się, co doprowadziło do jeszcze większej nadwagi. Marcin zdecydował się na kolejną operację. Za jakiś czas również wrócił do nałogu jedzenia. Podjął trzecia próbę. Kamera towarzyszy Marcinowi i lekarzom podczas przygotowań i samej operacji zmniejszenia żołądka

programme.title: Panny młode z piekła rodem
programme.desc: Twórcy serii w każdym odcinku przybliżają widzom gorączkowe ślubne przygotowania kolejnej pary narzeczonych. Zwłaszcza przyszłe panny młode są zdeterminowane, aby mieć idealny ślub. Dla wszystkich, którzy stają im na drodze są złośliwe, wymagające i egoistyczne. Aby zrealizować swój cel, są gotowe zapomnieć o skrupułach czy sentymentach. Wszystko bowiem ma być tak, jak to one sobie wymarzyły!

programme.sub-title: Kulinarne notatki z podróży Rachel Khoo: Londyn (odc. 10)

programme.title: Trinny i Susannah ubierają Norwegię

programme.title: Modowa sprawa narodowa
programme.desc: Cekiny, róże i tygrysie cętki - o tym i wielu innych przykładach złego gustu na zawsze zapomni każda z uczestniczek programu. Sztab specjalistów zadba o to, by z ich szaf zniknęły kiczowate ubrania

programme.title: No Limit
programme.desc: Vincent potrzebuje przeszczepu wątroby. Udaje mu się namierzyć swojego ojca Claude'a, który byłby idealnym dawcą. Okazuje się, że Libérati senior, słynny marsylski kryminalista, jest w boliwijskim więzieniu. Vincent chce go stamtąd wyciągnąć, ten jednak odmawia pomocy synowi. Tymczasem Gandel usiłuje wykorzystać dawne znajomości Claude'a do wyjaśnienia sprawy fałszywych pieniędzy, w którą zamieszany jest znany marsylski polityk, Jacques Brunetti. Vincent łączy siły z Juliette i razem dokonują przełomowego odkrycia w śledztwie(r)

programme.title: No Limit
programme.desc: Vincent potrzebuje przeszczepu wątroby. Udaje mu się namierzyć swojego ojca Claude'a, który byłby idealnym dawcą. programme.title: Sala operacyjna
programme.desc: U 65-letniej Urszuli wykryto dwa tętniaki mózgu. Uciążliwy ból szyi nie zwiastował poważnej diagnozy. Wcześniej jeden z lekarzy zlecił wykonanie rezonansu magnetycznego kręgosłupa szyjnego, ale nie dostrzegł niczego niepokojącego. Zabiegi i leki nie przyniosły jednak poprawy. Ula zasięgnęła porady kolejnego specjalisty i dopiero ten zauważył na obrazie z rezonansu obecność dwóch tętniaków. Kilka lat wcześniej podobną diagnozę usłyszała jej córka Iza. Kobieta miała operację zabezpieczenia jednego tętniaka mózgu. Na szczęście wszystko dobrze się skończyło. Teraz Ula czeka na zabieg. Niestety, nie ma przy niej córki, która pracuje w Londynie. Ula gorąco wierzy, że operacja się powiedzie

programme.title: Jej Szerokość Afrodyta
programme.desc: Grayson wraca do zdrowia po wypadku. Parker prosi Jane o pomoc Kim w sprawie matki nastoletniej Sary. Dziewczyna zmarła podczas operacji. Prawniczka zamierza pozwać placówkę o błąd w sztuce medycznej(n)

programme.title: No Limit
programme.desc: Dalsze losy francuskiego agenta Vincenta Libérati (Vincent Elbaz). Po dwóch latach służby w tajnej rządowej agencji Hydra Vincent chce zmienić swoje życie. Udało mu się pokonać nowotwór i nie chce podejmować się kolejnych sekretnych misji. Marzy o tym, by wrócić do byłej żony Alexandry (Hélene Seuzaret) i być obecnym w życiu ich córki Loli (Sarah Brannens). Jednak podczas swojej ostatniej akcji Vincent zostaje wystawiony na działanie trującego gazu, który uszkadza jego wątrobę. Konieczny jest pilny przeszczep. Dawcą może zostać jedynie ojciec Vincenta. Problem w tym, że nie są oni w najlepszych stosunkach, a na dodatek Claude Libérati (Patrick Chesnais) przebywa w kolumbijskim więzieniu(n)

programme.title: No Limit
programme.desc: Dalsze losy francuskiego agenta Vincenta Libérati (Vincent Elbaz). Po dwóch latach służby w tajnej rządowej agencji Hydra Vincent chce zmienić swoje życie. programme.title: Z pamiętnika lekarki
programme.desc: Nie dane było Gretchen cieszyć się miesiącem miodowym w ramionach swojego męża. Wszyscy obecni w kościele muszą przejść kwarantannę z powodu epidemii. Kaan nie radzi sobie ze sprawowaniem nadzoru(n)

programme.title: Wojna w Dolomitach
programme.desc: Maj 1915 roku, Południowy Tyrol. Na ślubie swojej siostry Andrel Gruber (William Moseley) poznaje piękną Włoszkę Franceskę Calzolari (Eugenia Costantini). Zakochuje się w niej od pierwszego wejrzenia. Tego samego dnia Włochy wypowiadają wojnę Austro-Węgrom. Żeby uratować swoje życie, Francesca zostaje kochanką miejscowego nauczyciela, Fritza Weinbergera (Fritz Karl). Kiedy Andrel dowiaduje się o ich romansie, rusza na front i o własnych siłach odpiera atak włoskiej piechoty. Tymczasem Austriakom udaje się pochwycić Angelo Calzolariego (Giulio Cristini), brata Franceski. Po uwolnieniu jeńca on i Andrel spieszą na ratunek dziewczynie. Tylko jednemu z nich uda się dotrzeć do celu wyprawy(n)

programme.title: Nowa Ja!
programme.desc: Iza nie umie porozumiewać się z ludźmi. Jest skupiona na sobie, uważa że powinna być zawsze w centrum uwagi. Nigdy nie próbowała się dopasować. Oczekuje, że to ludzie muszą się do niej dostosować(n)

programme.title: The Worst Witch

programme.title: The Worst Witch
programme.desc: Mildred's having fun jumping high into the air with Enid - using pirated magic to make the grass bouncy. Maud's getting fed up with Enid constantly distracting Mildred - Maud knows Mildred needs to knuckle down if she's going to stand a chance at the academy and can't bear the thought of losing her. Mildred receives a singing teddy from home and it makes her feel homesick. When Mildred looks to Maud for help in Miss Gullet's transformations class, Maud doesn't bail her out and Mildred turns Ethel into a pig instead of a mouse into frog. She doesn't even manage to turn Ethel back successfully - she still has a pig's snout! Mildred receives a harsh warning from Miss Hardbroom who threatens expulsion if she can't perform the spell correctly. Mildred feels fed up with all the rules of school and always being the worst witch. It's the final straw, she wants to go home. Drusilla intercepts her leaving, telling her that Maud and Enid are fighting. But it's a trick, and Mildred finds herself facing Ethel. As revenge for still having a pig snout, Ethel turns Mildred into a frog and throws her out of the window.(n)

programme.title: The Worst Witch
programme.desc: Everyone's surprised to hear the Great Wizard is making an unexpected visit to Cackle's Academy. He's had a tip off that the school is going rapidly downhill and it looks like non-magical Mildred is at the heart of the problems. Miss Cackle (really Agatha) refuses to expel Mildred and waxes lyrical about her. The Great Wizard insists that Mildred should perform a magical display to prove herself. Creative Mildred conducts a magical potions choir, but it ends in disaster leaving Miss Cackle on thin ice. To everyone's surprise, Miss Cackle (Agatha) makes Mildred lead a broomstick display. Mildred works out that Agatha is impersonating Miss Cackle but has to go ahead with the display - not realising Ethel had put a spell on the broomstick. Mildred begs Maud to find the real Miss Cackle, so while Mildred and Enid are in peril in the air, Maud battles her way up to Miss Cackle's room to find her under an entrancement spell. Just as Mildred and Enid start to plummet, the real Miss Cackle saves them. The Great Wizard has to eat his words - Mildred is a good witch and deserves her place in the school.(n)

programme.title: The Furchester Hotel
programme.desc: It's just another day at the Furchester Hotel, that is until the Furball, a bouncing furry monster ball, arrives in a flurry of bouncing and chanting! Soon all the Furchesters are jumping and chanting 'Furball!' too. Elmo asks why they are all shouting 'Furball' and Furgus says that it's because the Furball has arrived, it's the best game ever, whenever he turns up at the hotel they all play a game of 'Furball', he's very excited and goes to get his Furball equipment bag and everything is there except his Furball shoes. Furgus and Funella go to look for his shoes and tell Phoebe and Elmo to keep an eye on the Furball and not let him out of their sight. Just at that moment, the Furball disappears, only for them to spot him up on the balcony, they're soon chasing him all over the hotel. Phoebe decides to look in her Dad's Furball bag and finds a Furball net, they hear boinging and get ready to pounce, but they catch a very suspicious looking rabbit instead. Cookie Monster then comes along and tells them to use Furball bait - a cookie! They put the cookie in the Furball net and wait, but instead of catching a Furball they catch Cookie Monster instead, with which he remembers that cookies are Cookie Monster bait, not Furball bait.
